alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Haralson; Paulding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 7:28PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Paulding, east central Haralson and northeastern Carroll Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 728 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Draketown, or 11 miles southwest of Dallas. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Villa Rica, Temple, New Georgia and Draketown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
